author: wn.com
title: Miami Regionals Designated Purple Heart University (Miami University Regional Campuses)
text: ( Source : Miami University Regional Campuses) Miami Regionals Designated Purple Heart University October 5 , 2015 Miami University's regional campuses in Hamilton and Middletown have been designated a 'Purple Heart University' by the Military
